about_the_game:
In this first-person psychological horror game, survival is key. You are tasked with surviving as long as possible. You will feel how terrible it is to live in a white room. The game's core mechanic revolves around avoiding dangerous hallucinations and terrifying creatures that appear in various unique environments. Don't scream when you meet an entity!

  • Don't Scream: Be Quiet! Never look directly at the horrifying creatures you encounter. If you do, your fear will consume you, leading to your demise. Stay calm, look away, and find ways to escape.

  • Psychological Horror: White Room: Mind's Prison focuses on psychological horror, creating an intense atmosphere where paranoia, fear, and survival instincts are your only tools.

  • Level Progression: As you survive each level, the day counter in the White Room increases, indicating your passage of time within the prison. Every new day brings new dangers and more complex challenges.

  • Survive the Hallucinations: Each level presents new, surreal locations that challenge your mind. From dark forests to abandoned hotel, every environment offers its own set of dangers.

Key Features

  • First-person psychological horror with immersive environments

  • Don't Scream! Avoid terrifying creatures and be quiet!

  • Increasing difficulty with each level and the passage of days

  • Unique and unsettling environments that challenge your mind and senses

  • Atmospheric sound design and visuals to enhance the horror experience

Will you overcome your fears and survive in the White Room, or will your mind ultimately betray you? The choice is yours.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: glibc 2.17+, 32/64-bit
  • Processor: X64/X86 architecture
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 or AMD Radeon RX 550
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Lower quality setting for better performance.

  • Processor: X64/X86 architecture
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM

  • Additional Notes: Lower quality setting for better performance.
